title: Sampler, 1743
medium:
Medium: silk on linen
Technique: cross, satin and stem stitches on a plain weave foundation. Counted and uncounted stitches. Hemmed on both sides, selvedge at bottom. Cut top edge overcast.
creditline: Gift of Anonymous Donor from the Fraser/Martin Collection
description: Lower part of a sampler with scattered motifs including Christ on a cross, a pear tree with birds, the Agnus Dei, a woman spinning, a man bringing flowers to a woman in a boat and crowned initials.

tombstone.epitaph:
Sampler, 1743.
1743. Medium: silk on linen
